What does this fragment of code do?

\begin{lstlisting}
let a: Vec<i32> = (1..).step_by(3)
                       .take(3)
                       .map(|x| x * 2)
                       .collect();
\end{lstlisting}

  \choice Sets a to {[2, 4, 6]}
  \choice The program doesn't compile.
  \choice {[4, 10, 16]}
  \choice {[2. 8, 14]}
